summary: Chat application with GIF integration (Giphy picker) that displays animated GIFs in messages
architectural_notes: Giphy picker integration for selecting animated GIFs in chat
GIF data stored/retrieved in backend to display animated images instead of plain text names

existing_features.title: Update the MessageInput component to pass the complete GIF URL (not just the name) when a user selects a GIF from the Giphy picker

new_feature_requests.summary: Modify the message sending logic to store the complete GIF URL from the Giphy picker instead of just the GIF name, ensuring the URL points to the animated GIF resource
Update the MessageBubble component to detect and render GIF URLs as animated img elements in the message display, similar to how other media types are currently embedded

projectName: Fix GIF display to show animated images instead of plain text
